rows.stringify: $(identity.pronouns.singular) tries to stay home as much as possible.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) usually tries not to get noticed.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) always has a good joke to tell.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) knows all there is to know about farms.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) lived $(identity.pronouns.possessive) early years in a caravan.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) never goes anywhere without $(identity.pronouns.possessive) best friend.
